actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to improve the administration of the leave system for Federal employees.

summary.text: Entitles a Federal employee, upon separation from the Civil Service, to a lump sum payment for accumulated and accrued annual leave without limitation upon the number of days carried over from one year to the next. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5551(a), (b); 6304)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to improve the administration of the leave system for Federal employees.
